parameters.content:
## I'm a note 
END-TO-END WORKFLOW LOGIC

Your automation is:

Shopify Order Placed
        â†“
Webhook Triggered
        â†“
Order Data Extracted
        â†“
Mapped to Required Fields
        â†“
Inserted into Google Sheet


Now letâ€™s break each node ðŸ‘‡

ðŸ”µ STEP 1 â€” WEBHOOK NODE (ENTRY POINT)
What this does?

This node creates an HTTP endpoint inside n8n.

Your config:

POST /shopify-order


So n8n creates:

TEST URL:
http://localhost:5678/webhook-test/shopify-order

PRODUCTION URL:
http://localhost:5678/webhook/shopify-order

When Shopify places an order:

Shopify sends:

{
 "id":"ORD888",
 "email":"demo@gmail.com",
 "total_price":"4999"
}


to your webhook.

But n8n wraps incoming request like this:

{
 "body":{
   "id":"ORD888",
   "email":"demo@gmail.com",
   "total_price":"4999"
 },
 "headers":{},
 "query":{}
}


So actual data lives inside:

$json.body

ðŸ”µ STEP 2 â€” EXTRACT ORDER NODE (SET NODE)

Now this node is doing:

DATA TRANSFORMATION

You configured:

Field	Value
order_id	={{$json["body"]["order_id"]}}
email	={{$json["body"]["email"]}}
price	={{$json["body"]["price"]}}

So this:

{
 "body":{
   "id":"ORD888",
   "email":"demo@gmail.com",
   "total_price":"4999"
 }
}


becomes:

{
 "order_id":"ORD888",
 "email":"demo@gmail.com",
 "price":"4999"
}


Also:

keepOnlySet = true


means:

Remove all extra Shopify payload
Keep only required fields

ðŸ”µ STEP 3 â€” GOOGLE SHEETS NODE

Now this node takes:

{
 "order_id":"ORD888",
 "email":"demo@gmail.com",
 "price":"4999"
}


and appends it to:

Sheet1


Because:

You enabled:

Mapping Mode â†’ Auto Map Input Data


So n8n automatically matches:

Workflow Field	Sheet Column
order_id	order_id
email	email
price	price
ðŸ”µ STEP 4 â€” DATA INSERTED INTO SHEET

Google Sheet Row becomes:

order_id	email	price
ORD888	demo@gmail.com
	4999
ðŸ”µ TEST vs PRODUCTION MODE
Mode	URL
Testing	/webhook-test/shopify-order
Production	/webhook/shopify-order

After activation:

Shopify must call:

/webhook/shopify-order
